decisions.description: If this subflow has made any changes to the Opp Data then update the Opp record. Otherwise continue as normal.
decisions.name: Opp_Update_Required_Decision
decisions.label: Opp Update Required?

decisions.description: If RFI/RFP Submission Date is populated AND Process Start Date is populated then Process Start Date must be before both RFI and RFP Submission Dates.
decisions.name: Process_Start_Date_Incorrect_Decision
decisions.label: Process Start Date Incorrect

formulas.description: Formula to return the earliest date out of the RFI and RFP Submitted Dates.
formulas.name: f_Earliest_RFI_RFP_SubmittedDate

recordLookups.description: Get Account to use as input to Account Data Fix Subflow
recordLookups.name: Get_Account
recordLookups.label: Get Account

recordUpdates.description: Since the Opp Record Var is outputted back to the Flow that called this Subflow this Update Opp element is notstrictly necessary since the main flow will take care of updates to the record var. HOWEVER we deem it useful to update the Opp Record at this point if changes have been made to get them saved to the database as quickly as possible in case the user closes the main flow.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Opp
recordUpdates.label: Update Opp

fields.name: h_Date_Updates
fields.fieldText: Please note the Award Date must be before the Contract Start Date

validationRule.errorMessage: Contract Start Date must be after the Award Date
Contract End Date must be on or after {!New_Contract_Start_Date}

fields.name: sExtension_Contract_Start_End_Dates
fields.fieldText: Please note the Contract End Date must be on or after the Contract Start Date

validationRule.errorMessage: Contract End Date must be on or after {!Extension_New_Contract_Start_Date}

fields.name: Process_Start_Date_Screen_DT
fields.fieldText: Please note the Process Start Date must be before the RFI/RFP Submitted Dates ({!f_Earliest_RFI_RFP_SubmittedDate})

fields.name: Process_StartDate_ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: The selected Process Start Date is after RFI/RFP Submitted Date ({!f_Earliest_RFI_RFP_SubmittedDate})

fields.name: h_Description
fields.fieldText: Please provide a Description for the {!vInOut_Opportunity.Description} Opportunity

fields.name: h_error_message
fields.fieldText:
An error has occurred when attempting to update the Opportunity missing data. 


An error log has been created with the following error message for the Salesforce Support Team to review:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Update_Reference_With_Primary
fields.fieldText: Please provide a Reference for the Opportunity {!vInOut_Opportunity.Name}

fields.name: h_Source_Updates
fields.fieldText: Please select the Source for the Opportunity

value.stringValue: Opportunity: Full Opportunity Data Fix - Subflow
